LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Abhorrent.label: intense bigotry
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Abhorrent.description: Other beliefs are evil deceptions ruining the world. It's totally unacceptable to let them exist in the community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Approved.label: appreciated
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Approved.description: Other beliefs are worth understanding. It's good to live with others who think differently.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Disapproved.label: mild bigotry
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Disapproved.description: Other beliefs are clearly folly. It's not good to let them exist in the community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Exalted.label: exalted
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Exalted.description: Working through disagreement is the height of morality. It's very moral to live with others who think differently.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Horrible.label: moderate bigotry
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Horrible.description: Other beliefs are immoral delusions which do real harm. It's bad to let them exist in the community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Respected.label: highly appreciated
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Respected.description: Other beliefs hold unique knowledge. It's great to live with others who think differently.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Standard.label: neutral
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Standard.description: Other beliefs are neither approved or disapproved.
